metadata.title: CVE-2022-25255 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In Qt 5.9.x through 5.15.x before 5.15.9 and 6.x before 6.2.4 on Linux andUNIX, QProcess could execute a binary from the current working directorywhen not found in the PATH.

criterions.comment: qtbase-opensource-src: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
